data.title: Roberto Rossellini Biography
data.meta_description: Read all about Roberto Rossellini with TV Guide's exclusive biography including their list of awards, celeb facts and more at TV Guide.
data.text:
Fast Facts

Got his initial break making fascist propaganda films during the reign of Benito Mussolini

Early films like Rome, Open City made him a pioneer of the Italian Neo-realism movement

Rome, Open City; Paisan; and Germany Year Zero constitute his famous "War Trilogy

" Francois Truffaut wrote in a 1963 article that Rossellini was the "father of the French New Wave

" Served as President of the Cannes Film Festival jury in 1977, which ended just days before he suffered a fatal heart attack
